title: Spicy Camp Storylines
itunes:title: Spicy Camp Storylines
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the latest news around the NFL including AJ Green missing 6-8 weeks, (8:00) the Dolphins making a coaching staff change one week into training camp, (24:38) and the Cardinals waiving Robert Nkemdiche (26:40). It's not a hot take, it's a hot pepper when the heroes rate training camp in spiciest pepper ratings. (31:26)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
